TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_gaga_skbaley_sali, title = gaga_skbaley_sali, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/gaga_skbaley_sali} }

S.FORM: gaga skbaley sali Innglung kwara halan maki knblayan Tayal hiya ga, Sali ga spiyang knblayan ta. tmwang khu', lisuw biyak, lisuw welung, lapow ngayan, pga cyan tunux paris ta. kwara. 'yaya kbnaley ta sali ga innagan ta syow sali ta kwara, kwara innagan ta ga kwe ga maki btunux, khoni', mi'uy, ro ruma. baha hmcya skbaley ta sali, siga piyux hi mwah rmow kbley ga musa thyayun kbaley, ana lpyung ta ro gluw ta ga mwah rmow kbaley uy. kkyan ta sali:gmwayow kkyan ta sali cyoli ita Tayal hiya ga, kyan gaga innglung ta: (1) sobih ba'un musa p'umah lungun naha. (2) ba'un shtuy knyupan paris alang ta. (3) bley ci kkyan sali kya. (4) shri' ya'eh na kki'an. (5) talam spi ro mspi myasa kki'an.

gaga skbaley sali Innglong kwara halan maki knblayan Tayal hiya ga, Sali ga spiyang knblayan ta. tmwang kho', lisow biyak, lisow welong, lapow ngayan, pga cyan tonox paris ta. kwara. 'yaya kbnaley ta sali ga innagan ta syow sali ta kwara, kwara innagan ta ga kwe ga maki btonox, khoni', mi'oy, ro roma. baha hmcya skbaley ta sali, siga piyox hi mwah rmow kbley ga mosa thyayon kbaley, ana lpyong ta ro glow ta ga mwah rmow kbaley oy. kkyan ta sali:gmwayow kkyan ta sali cyoli ita Tayal hiya ga, kyan gaga innglong ta: (1) sobih ba'on mosa p'omah longon naha. (2) ba'on shtoy knyopan paris alang ta. (3) bley ci kkyan sali kya. (4) shri' ya'eh na kki'an. (5) talam spi ro mspi myasa kki'an.
